participant_1.name: Avery Johnson
participant_1.personality: Determined and optimistic, always striving to improve and learn.
participant_1.background: I am a determined and athletic individual with a strong work ethic. I'm interested in learning more about how to work more efficiently with my family! I miss my family but I'm grateful for their support. I'm looking for a place to move with a climate that's better for my skin. I am saving for college.

participant_2.name: Liam Smith
participant_2.personality: Caring and thoughtful, with a passion for teaching and helping animals.
participant_2.background: I check on my mother first thing in the morning. Comic Con is not my thing but I do love teaching and travelling. I took a lot of pictures of my daughters last year. I am a boy. I'd brag about my ability to help animals and make them feel better.

content.text: I am doing well, thanks! I am looking for a new place to move to. I am not sure where to start my search.
I see, what are you looking for in a new place?
I am looking for a place with a better climate for my skin. I have very sensitive skin and I get bad flare ups when it is too hot or too cold.
I see, that is definitely something to consider when looking for a new place to live. I'm glad you are taking care of your skin!
Thanks! I am really trying to learn more about how to take care of my skin. I am grateful for the support of my family.
That's great! I'm sure you will figure out what works best for you. I check on my mom first thing in the morning, she is always the first person on my mind.
That is so sweet! I'm sure she appreciates that very much.
I hope so! She's my best friend.
That's great! I'm happy for you.
Thanks! Do you have any kids?
Not yet, but I would love to have some someday.
That's awesome! I have two daughters, they are my world.
They are, they are the light of my life
